descriptionHtml:
Heilige Mutter Armor - CBBEv3M

		Original : [ R18Pn 00 - Heilige Mutter Armor for UNP and CBBE V3 ] by NPR
	
										Remodeled by MAK


[ R18Pn 00 - Heilige Mutter Armor for UNP and CBBE V3
	: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13098 ]

I remodeled MOD mentioned above to fit CBBEv3M.


	--- Installation ---
After having installed [ R18Pn 00 Heilige Mutter Armor for CBBE V3 ], please overwrite in this MOD.


	--- Thanks ---
Thank you for Mr. NPR!
I appreciate that you provide much wonderful MOD.



--- Answer to common question ---
Q. What does hairstyle MOD use?

A. Hairstyle MOD is
[ Tera Hair Weight Fix version ]
Because it is not a file uploaded in Nexus, please search it.


Q. What does face MOD use?

A. Face MOD is
[ RANs HeadMesh Variants by RAN46 ]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127

[ RANs Eyeliner Replacer by RAN46 ]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701

[ envision Face by DD AKT ]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7897
author: MAK
